name: BMW 7 Series
description: The price of BMW 7 Series, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 1.82  - 1.84 Crore. It is available in 2 variants, with engine options ranging from 2993 to 2998 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. 7 Series comes with 7 airbags. BMW 7 Series is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 12.61 to 16.55 kmpl for 7 Series.

variants.variant_name: 7 Series 740i M Sport 2998 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 12.61 kmpl, 375 bhp
7 Series 740d M Sport 2993 cc, Diesel, Automatic (TC), 16.55 kmpl, 281 bhp
